IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToCon.label: Incremental Common Shares Attributable to Dilutive Effect of Conversion of Debt Securities
IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToCon.description: Additional shares included in the calculation of diluted EPS as a result of the potentially dilutive effect of convertible debt securities using the if-converted method.

IntangibleAssetsNetExcludingGoodwill.label: Intangible Assets, Net (Excluding Goodwill)
IntangibleAssetsNetExcludingGoodwill.description: Sum of the carrying amounts of all intangible assets, excluding goodwill, as of the balance sheet date, net of accumulated amortization and impairment charges.

InterestCostsIncurred.label: Interest Costs Incurred
InterestCostsIncurred.description: Total interest costs incurred during the period and either capitalized or charged against earnings.

InterestExpenseJuniorSubordinatedDebentu.label: Interest Expense, Junior Subordinated Debentures
InterestExpenseJuniorSubordinatedDebentu.description: Interest expense incurred during the reporting period on junior subordinated debentures. Includes amortization of expenses incurred in the issuance of subordinated notes and debentures.

InterestExpenseRelatedParty.label: Interest Expense, Related Party
InterestExpenseRelatedParty.description: Amount of interest expense incurred on a debt or other obligation to related party.

InterestOnConvertibleDebtNetOfTax.label: Interest on Convertible Debt, Net of Tax
InterestOnConvertibleDebtNetOfTax.description: The after-tax amount of interest recognized in the period associated with any convertible debt.

InterestPaid.label: Interest Paid, Including Capitalized Interest, Operating and Investing Activities
InterestPaid.description: Amount of cash paid for interest, including, but not limited to, capitalized interest and payment to settle zero-coupon bond attributable to accreted interest of debt discount and debt instrument with insignificant coupon interest rate in relation to effective interest rate of borrowing attributable to accreted interest of debt discount; classified as operating and investing activities.

InterestPaidNet.label: Interest Paid, Excluding Capitalized Interest, Operating Activities
InterestPaidNet.description: Amount of cash paid for interest, excluding capitalized interest, classified as operating activity. Includes, but is not limited to, payment to settle zero-coupon bond for accreted interest of debt discount and debt instrument with insignificant coupon interest rate in relation to effective interest rate of borrowing attributable to accreted interest of debt discount.

InventoryFinishedGoods.label: Inventory, Finished Goods, Gross
InventoryFinishedGoods.description: Amount before valuation and LIFO reserves of completed merchandise or goods expected to be sold within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

InventoryNet.label: Inventory, Net
InventoryNet.description: Amount after valuation and LIFO reserves of inventory expected to be sold, or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

InventoryRawMaterials.label: Inventory, Raw Materials, Gross
InventoryRawMaterials.description: Amount before valuation and LIFO reserves of raw materials expected to be sold, or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

InventoryValuationReserves.label: Inventory Valuation Reserves
InventoryValuationReserves.description: Amount of valuation reserve for inventory.

InventoryWorkInProcess.label: Inventory, Work in Process, Gross
InventoryWorkInProcess.description: Amount before valuation and LIFO reserves of merchandise or goods in the production process expected to be completed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

JuniorSubordinatedNotes.label: Junior Subordinated Notes
JuniorSubordinatedNotes.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of long-term debt (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer) identified as Junior Subordinated Notes, which have a lower priority than senior instruments.

LeaseAndRentalExpense.label: Operating Leases, Rent Expense
LeaseAndRentalExpense.description: Amount of rent expense incurred for leased assets, including but not limited to, furniture and equipment, that is not directly or indirectly associated with the manufacture, sale or creation of a product or product line.

LeaseholdImprovementsGross.label: Leasehold Improvements, Gross
LeaseholdImprovementsGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation of additions or improvements to assets held under a lease arrangement.

LegalFees.label: Legal Fees
LegalFees.description: The amount of expense provided in the period for legal costs incurred on or before the balance sheet date pertaining to resolved, pending or threatened litigation, including arbitration and mediation proceedings.

Liabilities.label: Liabilities
Liabilities.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all liabilities that are recognized. Liabilities are probable future sacrifices of economic benefits arising from present obligations of an entity to transfer assets or provide services to other entities in the future.

LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.label: Liabilities and Equity
LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.description: Amount of liabilities and equity items, including the portion of equity attributable to noncontrolling interests, if any.

LiabilitiesAssumed1.label: Liabilities Assumed
LiabilitiesAssumed1.description: The fair value of liabilities assumed in noncash investing or financing activities.

LiabilitiesCurrent.label: Liabilities, Current
LiabilitiesCurrent.description: Total obligations incurred as part of normal operations that are expected to be paid during the following twelve months or within one business cycle, if longer.

LineOfCredit.label: Long-term Line of Credit
LineOfCredit.description: The carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the current and noncurrent portions of long-term obligations drawn from a line of credit, which is a bank's commitment to make loans up to a specific amount. Examples of items that might be included in the application of this element may consist of letters of credit, standby letters of credit, and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a maximum amount as of any point in time conditional on satisfaction of specified terms before, as of and after the date of drawdowns on the line. Includes short-term obligations that would normally be classified as current liabilities but for which (a) postbalance sheet date issuance of a long term obligation to refinance the short term obligation on a long term basis, or (b) the enterprise has entered into a financing agreement that clearly permits the enterprise to refinance the short-term obligation on a long term basis and the following conditions are met (1) the agreement does not expire within 1 year and is not cancelable by the lender except for violation of an objectively determinable provision, (2) no violation exists at the BS date, and (3) the lender has entered into the financing agreement is expected to be financially capable of honoring the agreement.

LineOfCreditFacilityAnnualPrincipalPayme.label: Line of Credit Facility, Annual Principal Payment
LineOfCreditFacilityAnnualPrincipalPayme.description: Amount of the total principal payments made during the annual reporting period.

LineOfCreditFacilityPeriodicPayment.label: Line of Credit Facility, Periodic Payment
LineOfCreditFacilityPeriodicPayment.description: Amount of the required periodic payments of both interest and principal.

LitigationSettlementExpense.label: Litigation Settlement, Expense
LitigationSettlementExpense.description: Amount of litigation expense, including but not limited to legal, forensic, accounting, and investigative fees.

LoansPayable.label: Loans Payable
LoansPayable.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of loans payable (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer).

LoansPayableCurrent.label: Loans Payable, Current
LoansPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of portion of long-term loans payable due within one year or the operating cycle if longer.

LongTermDebt.label: Long-term Debt
LongTermDebt.description: Amount, after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

LongTermDebtFairValue.label: Long-term Debt, Fair Value
LongTermDebtFairValue.description: The fair value amount of long-term debt whether such amount is presented as a separate caption or as a parenthetical disclosure. Additionally, this element may be used in connection with the fair value disclosures required in the footnote disclosures to the financial statements. The element may be used in both the balance sheet and disclosure in the same submission.

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, after Year Five
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year One
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Five
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Four
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Three
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Two
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtNoncurrent.label: Long-term Debt, Excluding Current Maturities
LongTermDebtNoncurrent.description: Amount after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs of long-term debt classified as noncurrent and excluding amounts to be repaid within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

LongTermInvestments.label: Long-term Investments
LongTermInvestments.description: The total amount of investments that are intended to be held for an extended period of time (longer than one operating cycle).

LongTermLoansPayable.label: Loans Payable, Noncurrent
LongTermLoansPayable.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of loans payable (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer), excluding current portion.

LongTermNotesPayable.label: Notes Payable, Noncurrent
LongTermNotesPayable.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of notes payable (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer), excluding current portion.

LossContingencyDamagesSoughtValue.label: Loss Contingency, Damages Sought, Value
LossContingencyDamagesSoughtValue.description: The value (monetary amount) of the award the plaintiff seeks in the legal matter.

MachineryAndEquipmentGross.label: Machinery and Equipment, Gross
MachineryAndEquipmentGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation of tangible personal property used to produce goods and services, including, but is not limited to, tools, dies and molds, computer and office equipment.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities, including discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from investing activities, including discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, including discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetIncomeLoss.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
NetIncomeLoss.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.label: Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Stockholders, Basic
NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities; of income (loss) available to common shareholders.

NonoperatingIncomeExpense.label: Nonoperating Income (Expense)
NonoperatingIncomeExpense.description: The aggregate amount of income or expense from ancillary business-related activities (that is to say, excluding major activities considered part of the normal operations of the business).

NotesAndLoansPayable.label: Notes and Loans Payable
NotesAndLoansPayable.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of all notes and loans payable (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer).

NotesIssued1.label: Notes Issued
NotesIssued1.description: The fair value of notes issued in noncash investing and financing activities.

NotesPayableCurrent.label: Notes Payable, Current
NotesPayableCurrent.description: Sum of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of the portions of long-term notes payable due within one year or the operating cycle if longer.

NotesPayableRelatedPartiesClassifiedCurr.label: Notes Payable, Related Parties, Current
NotesPayableRelatedPartiesClassifiedCurr.description: The amount for notes payable (written promise to pay), due to related parties. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

NotesPayableRelatedPartiesCurrentAndNonc.label: Notes Payable, Related Parties
NotesPayableRelatedPartiesCurrentAndNonc.description: The amount for notes payable (written promise to pay), due to related parties.

NotesPayableRelatedPartiesNoncurrent.label: Notes Payable, Related Parties, Noncurrent
NotesPayableRelatedPartiesNoncurrent.description: The amount for notes payable (written promise to pay), payable to related parties, which are due after one year (or one business cycle).

NotesPayableToBank.label: Notes Payable to Bank
NotesPayableToBank.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, the carrying value as of the balance sheet date of notes payable to banks, excluding mortgage notes, initially due beyond one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer.

NotesPayableToBankNoncurrent.label: Notes Payable to Bank, Noncurrent
NotesPayableToBankNoncurrent.description: The total amount due within more than 12 month, or the operating cycle if longer, on all notes payable to banks paid on an installment. This can include the amount of any loans from the applicant firm. This does not, however, include any mortgage balances.

NumberOfReportableSegments.label: Number of Reportable Segments
NumberOfReportableSegments.description: Number of segments reported by the entity. A reportable segment is a component of an entity for which there is an accounting requirement to report separate financial information on that component in the entity's financial statements.

OperatingExpenses.label: Operating Expenses
OperatingExpenses.description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Includes selling, general and administrative expense.

OperatingIncomeLoss.label: Operating Income (Loss)
OperatingIncomeLoss.description: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

OperatingLeaseLiability.label: Operating Lease, Liability
OperatingLeaseLiability.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease.

OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent.label: Operating Lease, Liability, Current
OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease, classified as current.

OperatingLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent.label: Operating Lease, Liability, Noncurrent
OperatingLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease, classified as noncurrent.

OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset.label: Operating Lease, Right-of-Use Asset
OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset.description: Amount of lessee's right to use underlying asset under operating lease.

OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortizatio.label: Operating Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, Amortization Expense
OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortizatio.description: Amount of amortization expense for right-of-use asset from operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable letter-terms in excess of one year.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueC.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due, Next Twelve Months
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueC.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Five Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Four Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fourth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Three Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Two Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueT.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due Thereafter
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueT.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due after the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRema.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Remainder of Fiscal Year
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRema.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the remainder of the fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesRentExpenseNet.label: Operating Leases, Rent Expense, Net
OperatingLeasesRentExpenseNet.description: Rental expense for the reporting period incurred under operating leases, including minimum and any contingent rent expense, net of related sublease income.

OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.label: Operating Lease, Weighted Average Discount Rate, Percent
OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.description: Weighted average discount rate for operating lease calculated at point in time.

OperatingLossCarryforwards.label: Operating Loss Carryforwards
OperatingLossCarryforwards.description: Amount of operating loss carryforward, before tax effects, available to reduce future taxable income under enacted tax laws.

OtherAccruedLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Other Accrued Liabilities, Current
OtherAccruedLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Amount of expenses incurred but not yet paid classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherAssetImpairmentCharges.label: Other Asset Impairment Charges
OtherAssetImpairmentCharges.description: The charge against earnings resulting from the write down of long lived assets other than goodwill due to the difference between the carrying value and lower fair value.

OtherDeferredCompensationArrangementsLia.label: Other Deferred Compensation Arrangements, Liability, Current
OtherDeferredCompensationArrangementsLia.description: Amount of the liabilities, classified as other, for deferred compensation arrangements payable within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

OtherDepreciationAndAmortization.label: Other Depreciation and Amortization
OtherDepreciationAndAmortization.description: Amount of expense charged against earnings to allocate the cost of tangible and intangible assets over their remaining economic lives, classified as other.

OtherFiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsGross.label: Other Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Gross
OtherFiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsGross.description: Amount before accumulated amortization of finite-lived intangible assets classified as other.

OtherLiabilities.label: Other Liabilities
OtherLiabilities.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other.

OtherLongTermDebtCurrent.label: Other Long-term Debt, Current
OtherLongTermDebtCurrent.description: Amount of long-term debt classified as other, payable within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.label: Other Nonoperating Income (Expense)
OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

OtherNotesPayable.label: Other Notes Payable
OtherNotesPayable.description: Amount of long-term notes payable classified as other.

OtherOperatingIncome.label: Other Operating Income
OtherOperatingIncome.description: The total amount of other operating income, the components of which are not separately disclosed on the income statement, from items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operation.

PaymentOfFinancingAndStockIssuanceCosts.label: Payment of Financing and Stock Issuance Costs
PaymentOfFinancingAndStockIssuanceCosts.description: The total of the cash outflow during the period which has been paid to third parties in connection with debt origination, which will be amortized over the remaining maturity period of the associated long-term debt and the cost incurred directly for the issuance of equity securities.

PaymentsForPreviousAcquisition.label: Payments for Previous Acquisition
PaymentsForPreviousAcquisition.description: Cash outflow representing an adjustment to the purchase price of a previous acquisition.

PaymentsForRent.label: Payments for Rent
PaymentsForRent.description: Cash payments to lessor's for use of assets under operating leases.

PaymentsOfDebtExtinguishmentCosts.label: Payment for Debt Extinguishment or Debt Prepayment Cost
PaymentsOfDebtExtinguishmentCosts.description: Amount of cash outflow for cost from early extinguishment and prepayment of debt. Includes, but is not limited to, third-party cost, premium paid, and other fee paid to lender directly for debt extinguishment or debt prepayment. Excludes accrued interest.

PaymentsOfDividends.label: Payments of Dividends
PaymentsOfDividends.description: Cash outflow in the form of capital distributions and dividends to common shareholders, preferred shareholders and noncontrolling interests.

PaymentsOfFinancingCosts.label: Payments of Financing Costs
PaymentsOfFinancingCosts.description: The cash outflow for loan and debt issuance costs.

PaymentsOfStockIssuanceCosts.label: Payments of Stock Issuance Costs
PaymentsOfStockIssuanceCosts.description: The cash outflow for cost incurred directly with the issuance of an equity security.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesGross.label: Payments to Acquire Businesses, Gross
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesGross.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of business during the period. The cash portion only of the acquisition price.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.label: Payments to Acquire Businesses, Net of Cash Acquired
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of a business, net of the cash acquired from the purchase.

PaymentsToAcquireEquityMethodInvestments.label: Payments to Acquire Equity Method Investments
PaymentsToAcquireEquityMethodInvestments.description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of or advances to an equity method investments, which are investments in joint ventures and entities in which the entity has an equity ownership interest normally of 20 to 50 percent and exercises significant influence.

PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.label: Payments to Acquire Property, Plant, and Equipment
PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale; includes cash outflows to pay for construction of self-constructed assets.

PensionAndOtherPostretirementBenefitExpe.label: Pension and Other Postretirement Benefits Cost (Reversal of Cost)
PensionAndOtherPostretirementBenefitExpe.description: Amount of cost (reversal of cost) for pension and other postretirement benefits.

PercentageOfWeightedAverageCostInventory.label: Percentage of Weighted Average Cost Inventory
PercentageOfWeightedAverageCostInventory.description: The percentage of weighted average cost inventory present at the reporting date when inventory is valued using different valuation methods.

PolicyholderDividends.label: Policyholder Dividends, Expense
PolicyholderDividends.description: Amount of expense for dividends to policyholders.

PreferredStockDividendsAndOtherAdjustmen.label: Preferred Stock Dividends and Other Adjustments
PreferredStockDividendsAndOtherAdjustmen.description: The aggregate value of preferred stock dividends and other adjustments necessary to derive net income apportioned to common stockholders.

PreferredStockDividendsIncomeStatementIm.label: Preferred Stock Dividends, Income Statement Impact
PreferredStockDividendsIncomeStatementIm.description: The amount of preferred stock dividends that is an adjustment to net income apportioned to common stockholders.

PreferredStockLiquidationPreferenceValue.label: Preferred Stock, Liquidation Preference, Value
PreferredStockLiquidationPreferenceValue.description: Value of the difference between preference in liquidation and the par or stated values of the preferred shares.

PreferredStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.label: Preferred Stock, Par or Stated Value Per Share
PreferredStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.description: Face amount or stated value per share of preferred stock nonredeemable or redeemable solely at the option of the issuer.

PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Authorized
PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.description: The maximum number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws.

PreferredStockSharesIssued.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Issued
PreferredStockSharesIssued.description: Total number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) issued to shareholders (includes related preferred shares that were issued, repurchased, and remain in the treasury). May be all or portion of the number of preferred shares authorized. Excludes preferred shares that are classified as debt.

PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Outstanding
PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.description: Aggregate share number for all nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by stockholders. Does not include preferred shares that have been repurchased.

PreferredStockValue.label: Preferred Stock, Value, Issued
PreferredStockValue.description: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable preferred shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssets.label: Prepaid Expense and Other Assets
PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssets.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits in future periods, and amount of other assets.

PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssetsCurrent.label: Prepaid Expense and Other Assets, Current
PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssetsCurrent.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits in future periods, and amount of other assets that are expected to be realized or consumed within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssetsNoncurrent.label: Prepaid Expense and Other Assets, Noncurrent
PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssetsNoncurrent.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits in future periods, and amount of other assets that are expected to be realized or consumed after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

PrepaidTaxes.label: Prepaid Taxes
PrepaidTaxes.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for income and other taxes that provide economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromBankDebt.label: Proceeds from Bank Debt
ProceedsFromBankDebt.description: The cash inflow from bank borrowing during the year.

ProceedsFromDivestitureOfBusinessesAndIn.label: Proceeds from Divestiture of Businesses and Interests in Affiliates
ProceedsFromDivestitureOfBusinessesAndIn.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from the sale of a business segment or subsidiary or sale of an entity that is related to it but not strictly controlled during the period (for example, an unconsolidated subsidiary, affiliate, joint venture or equity method investment).

ProceedsFromDivestitureOfInterestInSubsi.label: Proceeds from Divestiture of Interest in Subsidiaries and Affiliates
ProceedsFromDivestitureOfInterestInSubsi.description: The cash inflow associated with the deconsolidation of a previously consolidated subsidiary or sale of an entity that is related to it but not strictly controlled.

ProceedsFromFeesReceived.label: Proceeds from Fees Received
ProceedsFromFeesReceived.description: Cash received for fees during the current period. This element excludes cash proceeds from license fees.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.description: The cash inflow from the additional capital contribution to the entity.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfDebt.description: The cash inflow during the period from additional borrowings in aggregate debt. Includes proceeds from short-term and long-term debt.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPreferredStockAndP.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Preferred Stock and Preference Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPreferredStockAndP.description: Proceeds from issuance of capital stock which provides for a specific dividend that is paid to the shareholders before any dividends to common stockholders and which takes precedence over common stockholders in the event of liquidation.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPrivatePlacement.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Private Placement
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPrivatePlacement.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from entity's raising of capital via private rather than public placement.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfWarrants.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Warrants
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfWarrants.description: The cash inflow from issuance of rights to purchase common shares at predetermined price (usually issued together with corporate debt).

ProceedsFromIssuanceOrSaleOfEquity.label: Proceeds from Issuance or Sale of Equity
ProceedsFromIssuanceOrSaleOfEquity.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of common stock, preferred stock, treasury stock, stock options, and other types of equity.

ProceedsFromLinesOfCredit.label: Proceeds from Lines of Credit
ProceedsFromLinesOfCredit.description: Amount of cash inflow from contractual arrangement with the lender, including but not limited to, letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements.

ProceedsFromLongTermCapitalLeaseObligati.label: Proceeds from Long-term Capital Lease Obligations
ProceedsFromLongTermCapitalLeaseObligati.description: The cash inflow from proceeds received from lessor related to a long-term capital lease obligation.

ProceedsFromNotesPayable.label: Proceeds from Notes Payable
ProceedsFromNotesPayable.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

ProceedsFromOtherEquity.label: Proceeds from Other Equity
ProceedsFromOtherEquity.description: Amount of cash inflow from the issuance of equity classified as other.

ProceedsFromRelatedPartyDebt.label: Proceeds from Related Party Debt
ProceedsFromRelatedPartyDebt.description: The cash inflow from a long-term borrowing made from related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Proceeds from Advances from Affiliates.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfNotesPayable.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Notes Payable
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfNotesPayable.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from long-term debt supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

ProceedsFromSaleOfEquityMethodInvestment.label: Proceeds from Sale of Equity Method Investments
ProceedsFromSaleOfEquityMethodInvestment.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of equity method investments, which are investments in joint ventures and entities in which the entity has an equity ownership interest normally of 20 to 50 percent and exercises significant influence.

ProceedsFromSaleOfMachineryAndEquipment.label: Proceeds from Sale of Machinery and Equipment
ProceedsFromSaleOfMachineryAndEquipment.description: The cash inflow from sale of machinery and equipment.

ProceedsFromSaleOfProductiveAssets.label: Proceeds from Sale of Productive Assets
ProceedsFromSaleOfProductiveAssets.description: The cash inflow from the sale of property, plant and equipment (capital expenditures), software, and other intangible assets.

ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyPlantAndEquipm.label: Proceeds from Sale of Property, Plant, and Equipment
ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyPlantAndEquipm.description: The cash inflow from the sale of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale.

ProfitLoss.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ProfitLoss.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Gross
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Net
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.description: Amount after accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOther.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Other, Gross
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOther.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of other physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOtherAccumulate.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Other, Accumulated Depreciation
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOtherAccumulate.description: Amount of accumulated depreciation of long-lived, physical assets used to produce goods and services and not intended for resale, classified as other.

ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.label: Accounts Receivable, Credit Loss Expense (Reversal)
ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on accounts receivable.

PurchaseObligation.label: Purchase Obligation
PurchaseObligation.description: Minimum amount of purchase arrangement in which the entity has agreed to expend funds to procure goods or services from a supplier.

RelatedPartyTransactionDueFromToRelatedP.label: Related Party Transaction, Due from (to) Related Party
RelatedPartyTransactionDueFromToRelatedP.description: Receivables to be collected from (obligations owed to) related parties, net as of the balance sheet date where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth.

RepaymentsOfBankDebt.label: Repayments of Bank Debt
RepaymentsOfBankDebt.description: The cash outflow to settle a bank borrowing during the year.

RepaymentsOfDebtAndCapitalLeaseObligatio.label: Repayments of Debt and Lease Obligation
RepaymentsOfDebtAndCapitalLeaseObligatio.description: Amount of cash outflow for short-term and long-term debt and lease obligation.

RepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.label: Repayments of Lines of Credit
RepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.description: Amount of cash outflow for payment of an obligation from a lender, including but not limited to, letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements.

RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt.label: Repayments of Long-term Debt
RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash outflow for debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

RepaymentsOfLongTermLinesOfCredit.label: Repayments of Long-term Lines of Credit
RepaymentsOfLongTermLinesOfCredit.description: The cash outflow for the settlement of obligation drawn from a contractual arrangement with the lender, including letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time with maturities due beyond one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

RepaymentsOfNotesPayable.label: Repayments of Notes Payable
RepaymentsOfNotesPayable.description: The cash outflow for a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

RepaymentsOfOtherDebt.label: Repayments of Other Debt
RepaymentsOfOtherDebt.description: Amount of cash outflow for the payment of debt classified as other.

RepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.label: Repayments of Related Party Debt
RepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.description: The cash outflow for the payment of a long-term borrowing made from a related party where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Payments for Advances from Affiliates.

RepaymentsOfSubordinatedDebt.label: Repayments of Subordinated Debt
RepaymentsOfSubordinatedDebt.description: The cash outflow from the repayment of long-term borrowing where a lender is placed in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment (senior) in case of liquidation of the entity's assets or underlying collateral.

ReplacementReserveEscrow.label: Replacement Reserve Escrow
ReplacementReserveEscrow.description: This element represents those amounts set aside for the repair and replacement of real or personal property in the foreseen future. Such amount may be funded from sales revenue (for example; timeshare sales) or operating revenues; in a lump sum or installments (such as monthly); as per internal policy (for example: hotel operators), as required by contractual agreement (for example: sales contract); or by the terms of debt agreements.

RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

RevenueFromContractWithCustomerIncluding.label: Revenue from Contract with Customer, Including Assessed Tax
RevenueFromContractWithCustomerIncluding.description: Amount, including tax collected from customer, of revenue from satisfaction of performance obligation by transferring promised good or service to customer. Tax collected from customer is tax assessed by governmental authority that is both imposed on and concurrent with specific revenue-producing transaction, including, but not limited to, sales, use, value-added and excise.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.label: Right-of-Use Asset Obtained in Exchange for Operating Lease Liability
RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.description: Amount of increase in right-of-use asset obtained in exchange for operating lease liability.

SaleAndLeasebackTransactionGainLossNet.label: Sale and Leaseback Transaction, Gain (Loss), Net
SaleAndLeasebackTransactionGainLossNet.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale and leaseback transaction from transfer of asset accounted for as sale.

SaleLeasebackTransactionHistoricalCost.label: Sale Leaseback Transaction, Historical Cost
SaleLeasebackTransactionHistoricalCost.description: The historical cost of the asset(s) sold in connection with the sale of the property to another party and the lease of the property back to the seller.

SaleOfStockNumberOfSharesIssuedInTransac.label: Sale of Stock, Number of Shares Issued in Transaction
SaleOfStockNumberOfSharesIssuedInTransac.description: The number of shares issued or sold by the subsidiary or equity method investee per stock transaction.

SaleOfStockPricePerShare.label: Sale of Stock, Price Per Share
SaleOfStockPricePerShare.description: Per share amount received by subsidiary or equity investee for each share of common stock issued or sold in the stock transaction.

SalesOfRealEstate.label: Sales of Real Estate (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
SalesOfRealEstate.description: Revenue from the sale of commercial, industrial, or residential property during the period. This element is more likely than not relevant to an entity for which real estate operations are a principal activity. If real estate operations are not a principal activity, the reporting entity would likely use a gain (loss) on sale of property, plant, or equipment type element.

SalesRevenueGoodsNet.label: Sales Revenue, Goods, Net (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
SalesRevenueGoodsNet.description: Aggregate revenue during the period from the sale of goods in the normal course of business, after deducting returns, allowances and discounts.

SalesRevenueNet.label: Revenue, Net (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
SalesRevenueNet.description: Total revenue from sale of goods and services rendered during the reporting period, in the normal course of business, reduced by sales returns and allowances, and sales discounts.

SalesRevenueServicesNet.label: Sales Revenue, Services, Net (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
SalesRevenueServicesNet.description: Aggregate revenue during the period from services rendered in the normal course of business, after deducting allowances and discounts.

ShareBasedCompensation.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Noncash Expense
ShareBasedCompensation.description: Amount of noncash expense for share-based payment arrangement.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Forfeitures, Intrinsic Value, Amount Per Share
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Per share or unit weighted-average intrinsic value of award forfeited under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes share and unit options.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Risk Free Interest Rate, Maximum
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The maximum risk-free interest rate assumption that is used in valuing an option on its own shares.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Risk Free Interest Rate, Minimum
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The minimum risk-free interest rate assumption that is used in valuing an option on its own shares.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Non-Option Equity Instruments, Exercised
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of non-option equity instruments exercised by participants.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Non-Option Equity Instruments, Outstanding, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of equity instruments other than options outstanding, including both vested and non-vested instruments.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercisable, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of shares into which fully or partially vested stock options outstanding as of the balance sheet date can be currently converted under the option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercisable, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted-average price as of the balance sheet date at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance on vested portions of options outstanding and currently exercisable under the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Gross
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Gross number of share options (or share units) granted during the period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted average grant-date fair value of options granted during the reporting period as calculated by applying the disclosed option pricing methodology.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Intrinsic Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Amount by which the current fair value of the underlying stock exceeds the exercise price of options outstanding.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of options outstanding, including both vested and non-vested options.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted average price at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance under the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested and Expected to Vest, Exercisable, Aggregate Intrinsic Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Amount by which current fair value of underlying stock exceeds exercise price of fully vested and expected to vest exercisable or convertible options. Includes, but is not limited to, unvested options for which requisite service period has not been rendered but that are expected to vest based on achievement of performance condition, if forfeitures are recognized when they occur.

ShareBasedCompensationSharesAuthorizedUn.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Option, Exercise Price Range, Lower Range Limit
ShareBasedCompensationSharesAuthorizedUn.description: The floor of a customized range of exercise prices for purposes of disclosing shares potentially issuable under outstanding stock option awards on all stock option plans and other required information pertaining to awards in the customized range.

SharesIssued.label: Shares, Issued
SharesIssued.description: Number of shares of stock issued as of the balance sheet date, including shares that had been issued and were previously outstanding but which are now held in the treasury.

StockGrantedDuringPeriodValueSharebasedC.label: Shares Granted, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, after Forfeiture
StockGrantedDuringPeriodValueSharebasedC.description: Value, after forfeiture, of shares granted under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockGrantedDuringPeriodValueSharebasedC.label: Shares Granted, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, before Forfeiture
StockGrantedDuringPeriodValueSharebasedC.description: Value, before forfeiture, of shares granted under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockholdersEquity.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent
StockholdersEquity.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

StockIssued1.label: Stock Issued
StockIssued1.description: The fair value of stock issued in noncash financing activities.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesAcquisition.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Acquisitions
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesAcquisition.description: Number of shares of stock issued during the period pursuant to acquisitions.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesIssuedForSe.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Issued for Services
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesIssuedForSe.description: Number of shares issued in lieu of cash for services contributed to the entity. Number of shares includes, but is not limited to, shares issued for services contributed by vendors and founders.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesNewIssues.description: Number of new stock issued during the period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesPurchaseOfA.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Purchase of Assets
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesPurchaseOfA.description: Number of shares of stock issued during the period as part of a transaction to acquire assets that do not qualify as a business combination.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockOption.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockOption.description: Number of share options (or share units) exercised during the current period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Conversion of Convertible Securities
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.description: The gross value of stock issued during the period upon the conversion of convertible securities.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Conversion of Convertible Securities, Net of Adjustments
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.description: The net amount of stock issued during the period upon the conversion of convertible securities, net of adjustments (for example, to additional paid in capital) including the write-off of an equity component recognized to record the convertible debt instrument as two separate components - a debt component and an equity component. This item is meant to disclose the value of shares issued on conversion of convertible securities that were recorded as two separate (debt and equity) components.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Conversion of Units
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.description: Value of stock issued during the period upon the conversion of units. An example of a convertible unit is an umbrella partnership real estate investment trust unit (UPREIT unit).

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueIssuedForSer.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Issued for Services
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueIssuedForSer.description: Value of stock issued in lieu of cash for services contributed to the entity. Value of the stock issued includes, but is not limited to, services contributed by vendors and founders.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.description: Equity impact of the value of new stock issued during the period. Includes shares issued in an initial public offering or a secondary public offering.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueOther.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Other
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueOther.description: Value of shares of stock issued attributable to transactions classified as other.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValuePurchaseOfAs.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Purchase of Assets
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValuePurchaseOfAs.description: Value of shares of stock issued during the period as part of a transaction to acquire assets that do not qualify as a business combination.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.label: Shares Issued, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, after Forfeiture
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.description: Value, after forfeiture, of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockOptions.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Stock Options Exercised
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockOptions.description: Value of stock issued as a result of the exercise of stock options.

SubordinatedDebt.label: Subordinated Debt
SubordinatedDebt.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of subordinated debt (with initial maturities beyond one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer). Subordinated debt places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment in liquidation of the entity's assets.

TaxCreditCarryforwardAmount.label: Tax Credit Carryforward, Amount
TaxCreditCarryforwardAmount.description: The amount of the tax credit carryforward, before tax effects, available to reduce future taxable income under enacted tax laws.

TaxesPayableCurrent.label: Taxes Payable, Current
TaxesPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory income, sales, use, payroll, excise, real, property and other taxes. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

ValuationAllowancesAndReservesChargedToC.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Additions, Charge to Cost and Expense
ValuationAllowancesAndReservesChargedToC.description: Amount of increase in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves from charge to cost and expense.

ValuationAllowancesAndReservesDeductions.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Deduction
ValuationAllowancesAndReservesDeductions.description: Amount of decrease in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic and Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.description: Average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating basic and diluted earnings per share (EPS).

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsPremiumsAndO.label: Allowance for Doubtful Accounts, Premiums and Other Receivables
AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsPremiumsAndO.description: The valuation allowance as of the balance sheet date to reduce the gross amount of receivables to estimated net realizable value, which would be presented in parentheses on the face of the balance sheet.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Including Disposal Group and Discontinued Operations
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; including, but not limited to, disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

CompensatingBalanceAmount.label: Compensating Balance, Amount
CompensatingBalanceAmount.description: The amount of a specific compensating balance arrangement that is maintained under an agreement for a bank loan or future credit availability.

DeferredRevenueRevenueRecognized1.label: Deferred Revenue, Revenue Recognized
DeferredRevenueRevenueRecognized1.description: Amount of revenue recognized that was previously reported as deferred or unearned revenue.

DeferredTaxAssetsOperatingLossCarryforwa.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Operating Loss Carryforwards, Not Subject to Expiration
DeferredTaxAssetsOperatingLossCarryforwa.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible operating loss carryforwards that are not subject to expiration dates.

LiabilitiesOfDisposalGroupIncludingDisco.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Liabilities, Current
LiabilitiesOfDisposalGroupIncludingDisco.description: Amount classified as liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

LiabilitiesOfDisposalGroupIncludingDisco.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Liabilities, Noncurrent
LiabilitiesOfDisposalGroupIncludingDisco.description: Amount classified as liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of beyond one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

LongTermDebtCurrent.label: Long-term Debt, Current Maturities
LongTermDebtCurrent.description: Amount, after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt, classified as current. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

OtherOperatingActivitiesCashFlowStatemen.label: Other Operating Activities, Cash Flow Statement
OtherOperatingActivitiesCashFlowStatemen.description: Other cash or noncash adjustments to reconcile net income to cash provided by (used in) operating activities that are not separately disclosed in the statement of cash flows (for example, cash received or cash paid during the current period for miscellaneous operating activities, net change during the reporting period in other assets or other liabilities).

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Related Party Debt
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from long-term debt by a related party. Related parties, include, but are not limited to, affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, and pension trusts.

ProceedsFromSaleOfSecuritiesOperatingAct.label: Proceeds from Sale of Securities, Operating Activities
ProceedsFromSaleOfSecuritiesOperatingAct.description: Cash received from sale of investments in debt and equity securities, classified as operating activities, during the period; includes trading securities and any other investments classified as operating.

ReceivableWithImputedInterestNetAmount.label: Receivable with Imputed Interest, Net Amount
ReceivableWithImputedInterestNetAmount.description: The receivable or note face amount less the unamortized discount or premium.

ReorganizationValueCashInExcessOfNormalO.label: Reorganization Value, Cash in Excess of Normal Operating Needs
ReorganizationValueCashInExcessOfNormalO.description: Amount of reorganization value related to cash in excess of normal operating requirements generated by operations. Reorganization value is the amount attributed to the reconstituted entity, as well as the expected net realizable value of those assets that will be disposed before reconstitution occurs.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Expected Dividend Rate
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The estimated dividend rate (a percentage of the share price) to be paid (expected dividends) to holders of the underlying shares over the option's term.

TreasuryStockCommonShares.label: Treasury Stock, Common, Shares
TreasuryStockCommonShares.description: Number of previously issued common shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage. Excludes amount for disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

ExcessStockSharesIssued.label: Excess Stock, Shares Issued
ExcessStockSharesIssued.description: Number of excess stock shares of an entity that have been sold or granted to shareholders.

FacilityCosts.label: Facility Costs
FacilityCosts.description: Facility expenses incurred related to gas and oil produced and sold during the reporting period.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Payment, Due
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueNextTwel.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year One
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueNextTwel.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFive.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Five
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFive.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFour.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFour.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearThre.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearThre.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearTwo.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Two
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearTwo.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinancingReceivableRevolvingConvertedToT.label: Financing Receivable, Revolving, Converted to Term Loan
FinancingReceivableRevolvingConvertedToT.description: Amount of revolving financing receivable converted to term loan.

LineOfCreditFacilityFairValueOfAmountOut.label: Line of Credit Facility, Fair Value of Amount Outstanding
LineOfCreditFacilityFairValueOfAmountOut.description: Fair value of the amount outstanding under the credit facility.

LongTermDebtAndCapitalLeaseObligationsIn.label: Long-term Debt and Lease Obligation, Including Current Maturities
LongTermDebtAndCapitalLeaseObligationsIn.description: Amount of long-term debt and lease obligation, including portion classified as current.

AmountOfDilutiveSecuritiesStockOptionsAn.label: Dilutive Securities, Effect on Basic Earnings Per Share, Options and Restrictive Stock Units
AmountOfDilutiveSecuritiesStockOptionsAn.description: Amount of increase (decrease) to net income used for calculating diluted earnings per share (EPS), resulting from the assumed exercise of stock options or restrictive stock units (RSUs).

CashAcquiredInExcessOfPaymentsToAcquireB.label: Cash Acquired in Excess of Payments to Acquire Business
CashAcquiredInExcessOfPaymentsToAcquireB.description: The cash inflow associated with the acquisition of a business when the cash held by the acquired business exceeds the cash payments to acquire the business.

ConvertibleNotesPayable.label: Convertible Notes Payable
ConvertibleNotesPayable.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of a written promise to pay a note, initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer, which can be exchanged for a specified amount of one or more securities (typically common stock), at the option of the issuer or the holder.

DebtInstrumentConvertibleIfConvertedValu.label: Debt Instrument, Convertible, If-converted Value in Excess of Principal
DebtInstrumentConvertibleIfConvertedValu.description: The amount by which the convertible debt's if-converted value exceeds its principle amount at the balance sheet date, regardless of whether the instrument is currently convertible. This element applies to public companies only.

DebtInstrumentInterestRateDuringPeriod.label: Debt Instrument, Interest Rate During Period
DebtInstrumentInterestRateDuringPeriod.description: The average effective interest rate during the reporting period.

DueToOtherRelatedPartiesCurrentAndNoncur.label: Due to Other Related Parties
DueToOtherRelatedPartiesCurrentAndNoncur.description: Amount payable to related parties classified as other.

FinanceLeasePrincipalPayments.label: Finance Lease, Principal Payments
FinanceLeasePrincipalPayments.description: Amount of cash outflow for principal payment on finance lease.

InterestExpense.label: Interest Expense
InterestExpense.description: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense.

OtherLongTermDebtNoncurrent.label: Other Long-term Debt, Noncurrent
OtherLongTermDebtNoncurrent.description: Amount of long-term debt classified as other, payable after one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

OtherNoncashExpense.label: Other Noncash Expense
OtherNoncashExpense.description: Amount of expense or loss included in net income that result in no cash flow, classified as other.

OtherNoncashIncome.label: Other Noncash Income
OtherNoncashIncome.description: Amount of income or gain included in net income that result in no cash inflow (outflow), classified as other.

OtherNoncashIncomeExpense.label: Other Noncash Income (Expense)
OtherNoncashIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) included in net income that results in no cash inflow (outflow), classified as other.

PaymentsForFees.label: Payments for Other Fees
PaymentsForFees.description: Amount of cash outflow for fees classified as other.

PaymentsForProceedsFromDepositOnLoan.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Deposit on Loan
PaymentsForProceedsFromDepositOnLoan.description: The net cash inflow or outflow from resulting from payment, receipt or drawdown of cash deposit to guarantee a loan during the period.

RepaymentsOfDebt.label: Repayments of Debt
RepaymentsOfDebt.description: The cash outflow during the period from the repayment of aggregate short-term and long-term debt. Excludes payment of capital lease obligations.

UnamortizedDebtIssuanceExpense.label: Unamortized Debt Issuance Expense
UnamortizedDebtIssuanceExpense.description: The remaining balance of debt issuance expenses that were capitalized and are being amortized against income over the lives of the respective bond issues. This does not include the amounts capitalized as part of the cost of the utility plant or asset.

DebtInstrumentPeriodicPaymentPrincipal.label: Debt Instrument, Periodic Payment, Principal
DebtInstrumentPeriodicPaymentPrincipal.description: Amount of the required periodic payments applied to principal.

FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortization.label: Finance Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, Amortization
FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortization.description: Amount of amortization expense attributable to right-of-use asset from finance lease.

InventoryGross.label: Inventory, Gross
InventoryGross.description: Gross amount, as of the balance sheet date, of merchandise, goods, commodities, or supplies held for future sale or to be used in manufacturing, servicing or production process.

NumberOfOperatingSegments.label: Number of Operating Segments
NumberOfOperatingSegments.description: Number of operating segments. An operating segment is a component of an enterprise: (a) that engages in business activities from which it may earn revenues and incur expenses (including revenues and expenses relating to transactions with other components of the same enterprise), (b) whose operating results are regularly reviewed by the enterprise's chief operating decision maker to make decisions about resources to be allocated to the segment and assess its performance, and (c) for which discrete financial information is available. An operating segment may engage in business activities for which it has yet to earn revenues, for example, start-up operations may be operating segments before earning revenues.

OtherLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Other Liabilities, Current
OtherLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

RevenuesNetOfInterestExpense.label: Revenues, Net of Interest Expense
RevenuesNetOfInterestExpense.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income after deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryCap.label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Capital and Surplus, Balance
StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryCap.description: The amount of statutory capital and surplus (stockholders' equity) as of the balance sheet date using prescribed or permitted statutory accounting practices (rather than GAAP, if different) of the state or country.
